name: RogueBot - GMTK JAM 2020
description:
Each life, only a select set of randomized keys can be used to control your character. As you hurtle recklessly through deadly dungeons, you must rapidly assemble and adapt your controller to survive. Guide your simple-minded robot companion out of harm's way - before time runs out!

Mouse and Keyboard recommended. When the round begins, use your mouse to drag/drop keys into controller slots on the controls panel.

Once you have assembled your custom controls, tap the corresponding keys on your keyboard to move RogueBot up,down, left, and right. RogueBot will automatically continue moving in whatever direction he was last commanded. Be mindful - you may need to switch your controls on the fly!
